（小提琴图 + 抖散图）= sina 图




```{r}
library(ggforce)


ggplot(mpg,aes(x = drv, y = hwy ))+
     geom_violin()+
    geom_sina(size = 0.85)

```


```{r}
ggplot(mpg,aes(x = drv, y = hwy ))+
    geom_violin()+
    geom_jitter(width = 0.25, size = 0.85)
```
